Traded from New York (N) to Pittsburgh on 2/5/1981 (Going to PIT: 1B K. Hrbek, RF V. Hayes, CF G. Redus, P B. Holton. Going to NYM: LF G. Matthews Sr., RF H. Kadota, P T. Johnson)...
Injured on 6/14/1981 with a Inflamed Back Muscle, out for one week...
Injured on 4/12/1982 with a Torn Bicep Muscle, out for entire career...
Drafted in 1st round, 15th overall pick, by St. Louis in 1987...
Had first career hit on 5/14/1989, off Fernando Valenzuela (PHI)...
Hit first career homerun on 6/18/1989, off Luis Leal (HOU)...
Won World Series with St. Louis in 1993...
Signed as a free agent by Texas on 2/7/1995 to a 3-year deal worth $2,150,000 per year...
Was selected to the 1995 Allstar game...
